miniapp.name: m00nlander
miniapp.subtitle: Land safely on the moon with m00nad
miniapp.description: A classic lunar lander game with challenging terrain, fuel management, and crypto payments. Navigate your spacecraft to smooth landing zones before running out of fuel. Win m00nad tokens on Monad.
miniapp.ogDescription: Play m00nlander on Farcaster. Classic lunar lander game with Monad rewards.
